channel.title: VPS GLITCH! funny but not really relevent to this forum sorry
channel.description:
Hello just a weird glitch that i found when changing my vps from windows 2008 to windows 2003, the vps was originally meant to have 20gb of disk space. im certainly not complaining i now have over 200gb free. They will probably change it tho. =(.
[img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/2qdpzcn.jpg[/img]
Sorry for posting here i thought I'd just show you guys.
Thanks james.

item.title: VPS GLITCH! funny but not really relevent to this forum sorry
item.dc:creator: @amzinaiscape amzinaiscape
item.description:
@amzinaiscape wrote:

Vain_:

I don’t see how this is funny or a glitch

because it’s not supposed to be 250gb therefore its a glitch/error in setting up the server.

less HD space is used on a 2003 server. plus no need to have 2008.

p.s they have rectified it now but they have still given me 10gb extra lol…

item.title: VPS GLITCH! funny but not really relevent to this forum sorry
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Does it matter? explain why you need 250GB of hard drive space to hold a server.
Exactly, you don’t. So even with your original 20gb you’d be fine…

If you be a good Samaritan and report it to them they might give you a discount or some shit. Not likely. But might.
